problem_text_cn: 如图,小明从A点出发,沿直线前进10米后向左转36°,再沿直线前进10米,再向左转36°……照这样走下去,他第一次回到出发点A点时,一共走的路程是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, Xiaoming starts from point A, walks in a straight line N_0, then turns left N_1, then walks in a straight line N_2, and then turns left N_3...Go on like this, when he returns to the starting point A for the first time, he walks together. The distance is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵360÷36=10,他需要走10次才会回到原来的起点,即一共走了10×10=100米.故选A.
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了多边形的外角和定理.任何一个多边形的外角和都是360°
